programme.title: Du silence et des ombres
programme.desc:
(3) U.S. 1962. Racial prejudice in a small southern town as seen through the eyes of two youngsters whose father defends a Negro accused of raping a white girl.
Réalisation : R. Mulligan
Avec : Gregory Peck Mary Badham Philip Alford

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc: (S04EP05) In this episode: Discovering your place. Life on home dialysis may limit physical access to the world, but doesn't stop one person from sharing their creative flair with others.

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc: (S05EP32) In this episode of Double Tap TV, we talk to HumanWare and Microsoft about their Designed for Surface program, which enhances support for Braille displays on Surface devices.

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc: (S01EP07) Two women who are blind run an accessibility consulting company in Kingston, Ontario. They struggle with securing new contracts and are looking for ways to streamline their approach.

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc: (S01EP01) Sexuality Educator Rachele Manett explores the unique and varied ways people with a disability find partners and navigate the world of dating and sex.

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S01EP05) Christa is a musician, author and broadcaster who has added mom to her list of jobs. She wants a new wardrobe that isn't curated to handle spills and stains, but rather a colourful, elevated version that shows the world this mom has it going on !
Année : 2022

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
Karen Weaver, Mayor of Flint, Michigan Mitch Twolan, Mayor of Huron-Kinloss, Ontario, explore how to ensure the nearly 40 million Canadians and Americans around the Great Lakes have clean water by examining the Flint Water Crisis.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S03EP06) Mary visits Owen Sound, Ont. , to meet Chef Zach Keeshig. A progressive Indigenous chef who specializes in unique dishes inspired by his Ojibway culture.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP08) Alex and Chris are on the same page when it comes to reclaiming materials, as they up-cycle an old window into a coffee table and a door into a vanity.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S03EP03) Radio personality Erin Davis joins Christine and Carl in the kitchen to talk stuffed foods.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
Explore the physical, social, and emotional benefits of equine therapeutic riding as told by the riders in their own language, and translated by the volunteers and parents who know them best.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP03) Alex and Chris help build community by making a little free library for passersby, and learn about blacksmithing to make a sign for a community centre.
Année : 2017

programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP02) Learn more about Young Carers, who are children under the age of 18 in a care-giving role for a parent, grandparent, sibling or relative with a chronic or life-threatening illness, disability, addiction or mental illness, among others.

programme.title: L'appel du coeur

programme.desc:
